data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Svay Rieng, Cambodia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Svay Rieng, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help 96 new simple churches start among the 482,800 people in the state of Svay Rieng, Cambodia. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Svay Rieng, Cambodia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Svay Rieng that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Khmer Krom people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Svay Rieng, Cambodia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Svay Rieng, Cambodia to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary:
the state of Svay Rieng, Cambodia has a population of 482,800.

We estimate Svay Rieng has 9,875 people who might know Jesus, 6,704 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 466,221 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 482,800 citizens of Svay Rieng, Cambodia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.
